schema.name: start_conversation_welcome
schema.default_value: Cm n bn  tin tng s dng {$BOT_NAME}. Yu cu tham gia ca bn s c duyt trong vng 48 gi lm vic.

options.template: Yu cu ng k ca bn c duyt thnh cng. Mt s bc c bn bt u s dng bot: 1. TCH HP TI KHON Tch hp ti khon Telegram hoc ti khon cc knh khc, v d: Zalo, Lark, Open Project, ... s dng tnh nng ca Bot. H thng h tr ngi dng tch hp mt hoc nhiu ti khon mi loi. V d: 1 ti khon Lark, 2 ti khon Zalo, 2 ti khon Open Project, ... 1a. Tch hp ti khon Lark Bn cn dng lnh /lark_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 1b. Tch hp ti khon Zalo Bn cn dng lnh /zalo_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 1c. Tch hp ti khon Open Project Bn cn dng lnh /open_project_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 2. NG K THEO DI TIN NHN ng k nhn tin nhn t mt hoc nhiu nhm c chn Ty thuc nn tng m tin nhn c c th c thu thp hay khng. Mc nh, h thng ch ghi nhn tin nhn tnh t thi im c ng k thnh cng. 2a. ng k group/supergroup Telegram Bn s cn thm Bot vo group/supergroup trc khi ng k. Sau khi thm Bot, s dng lnh /telegram_sub ng k. 2b. ng k knh Zalo Dng lnh /zalo_sub ng k knh Zalo khi chat trc tip vi Bot. Lu : H thng ng b tin nhn trn Zalo mi 4 gi, bt u t 00:00 nn bn s cn ch tin nhn c ng b v h thng. Nu bn mun ch ng ng b, hy dng lnh /zalo_sync to yu cu ng b. H thng s ghi nhn v u tin x l. 3. RECAP TIN NHN Tm tt ni dung tin nhn trong mt hoc nhiu nhm c chn trong khong thi gian nht nh. Lnh c bn: /recap Lnh i km thi lng recap: /recap 8 s recap tin nhn trong 8 gi trc 4. DAILY TASK REPORT Tng hp task hng ngy t mt hoc nhiu ngun khc nhau. Mc nh, h thng s t ng tng hp task vo 07:00 mi ngy cho tt c cc ngun c tch hp. Trong trng hp bn mun xem report vo mt mc thi gian khc, hy s dng lnh /task_report yu cu report. THNG TIN LIN H Nu cn h tr, vui lng lin h email support@egany.com

schema.name: start_conversation_account_approved
schema.default_value: Yu cu ng k ca bn c duyt thnh cng. Mt s bc c bn bt u s dng bot: 1. TCH HP TI KHON Tch hp ti khon Telegram hoc ti khon cc knh khc, v d: Zalo, Lark, Open Project, ... s dng tnh nng ca Bot. H thng h tr ngi dng tch hp mt hoc nhiu ti khon mi loi. V d: 1 ti khon Lark, 2 ti khon Zalo, 2 ti khon Open Project, ... 1a. Tch hp ti khon Lark Bn cn dng lnh /lark_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 1b. Tch hp ti khon Zalo Bn cn dng lnh /zalo_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 1c. Tch hp ti khon Open Project Bn cn dng lnh /open_project_add khi chat trc tip vi Bot tch hp. 2. NG K THEO DI TIN NHN ng k nhn tin nhn t mt hoc nhiu nhm c chn Ty thuc nn tng m tin nhn c c th c thu thp hay khng. Mc nh, h thng ch ghi nhn tin nhn tnh t thi im c ng k thnh cng. 2a. ng k group/supergroup Telegram Bn s cn thm Bot vo group/supergroup trc khi ng k. Sau khi thm Bot, s dng lnh /telegram_sub ng k. 2b. ng k knh Zalo Dng lnh /zalo_sub ng k knh Zalo khi chat trc tip vi Bot. Lu : H thng ng b tin nhn trn Zalo mi 4 gi, bt u t 00:00 nn bn s cn ch tin nhn c ng b v h thng. Nu bn mun ch ng ng b, hy dng lnh /zalo_sync to yu cu ng b. H thng s ghi nhn v u tin x l. 3. RECAP TIN NHN Tm tt ni dung tin nhn trong mt hoc nhiu nhm c chn trong khong thi gian nht nh. Lnh c bn: /recap Lnh i km thi lng recap: /recap 8 s recap tin nhn trong 8 gi trc 4. DAILY TASK REPORT Tng hp task hng ngy t mt hoc nhiu ngun khc nhau. Mc nh, h thng s t ng tng hp task vo 07:00 mi ngy cho tt c cc ngun c tch hp. Trong trng hp bn mun xem report vo mt mc thi gian khc, hy s dng lnh /task_report yu cu report. THNG TIN LIN H Nu cn h tr, vui lng lin h email support@egany.com

options.template: TASK REPORT - Ti khon: {$ACCOUNT_PLATFORM} | {$ACCOUNT_NAME} - Thi gian: {$TODAY} Ni dung: I. TNG QUAN VIC PHI LM: {$OWNED_COUNT} hon thnh: {$DONE_COUNT} ({$DONE_PERCENTAGE}%) Cha bt u: {$BACKLOG_COUNT} ({$BACKLOG_PERCENTAGE}%) ang thc hin: {$TODO_COUNT} ({$TODO_PERCENTAGE}%) Tr hn: {$LATE_COUNT} ({$LATE_PERCENTAGE}%) II. HON THNH HM QUA {$YESTERDAY_REPORT} III. HM NAY hon thnh: {$TODAY_DONE_REPORT} tr hn: {$TODAY_LATE_REPORT} ang thc hin: {$TODAY_TODO_REPORT} Cha bt u: {$TODAY_BACKLOG_REPORT} =============== IV. VIC CN THEO DI: {$FOLLOW_COUNT} hon thnh: {$FOLLOW_DONE_COUNT} {$FOLLOW_DONE_REPORT} ang thc hin: {$FOLLOW_TODO_COUNT} {$FOLLOW_TODO_REPORT} Tr hn: {$FOLLOW_LATE_COUNT} {$FOLLOW_LATE_REPORT} Cha bt u: {$FOLLOW_BACKLOG_COUNT} {$FOLLOW_BACKLOG_REPORT} To ra cha giao ai: {$FOLLOW_UNASSIGNED_COUNT} {$FOLLOW_UNASSIGNED_REPORT} =============== V. NH GI - Nng sut: {$EFFICIENCY_PERCENTAGE_DIFF}

options.template: Recap Prompt s c s dng tm tt ni dung tin nhn t cc cuc hi thoi c ng k. Recap Prompt ca h thng s tng ng vi System Prompt khi s dng AI. Mt s yu cu v prompt: - Gii hn di: t hn 4000 k t, tnh c khong trng - Format: Markdown - Input: Danh sch tin nhn dng text, mi tin nhn s l mt dng trong danh sch - Output: Ngi dng cn yu cu AI model tr v nh dng Telegram HTML m bo tin nhn c gi qua Telegram m khng gp li Hnh thc gi yu cu n AI Model: - system: recap_prompt - user: danh_sch_tin_nhn Nu bn hiu v cch vit prompt cho tnh nng Recap, vui lng nhp prompt mi bn di. Nu bn mun hy yu cu, hy nhp quit

Nu bn mun hy yu cu, hy nhp quit

options.template: Task Report Prompt s c s dng x l thm cc task trong ngy ca ngi dng. V d: - Trch xut thng tin quan trng - xut, nh gi v nh hng x l cho task - ... Task Report Prompt ca h thng s tng ng vi System Prompt khi s dng AI. Mt s yu cu v prompt: - Gii hn di: t hn 4000 k t, tnh c khong trng - Format: Markdown - Input: Task Report c phn loi theo cc mc nh template mu - Output: Ngi dng cn yu cu AI model tr v nh dng Telegram HTML m bo tin nhn c gi qua Telegram m khng gp li Hnh thc gi yu cu n AI Model: - system: task_report_prompt - user: task_report_ca_ngy_hin_ti Nu bn hiu v cch vit prompt cho tnh nng Task Report, vui lng nhp prompt mi bn di. Nu bn mun hy yu cu, hy nhp quit
